content: Collaborated AI specialist/AI Solution architecture at Viceph - an AI driven application for orthodontist Viceph.net. Researching member at Vietnam Orthodontic Research Group [VORG] Research Engineer with +7 years of full-time work experience of Computer Vision at Panasonic R&D Center Vietnam. Software engineer with +2 years of experience of Machine Vision/Embedded system at Foxconn Vietnam R&D Center Foxconn Company. [Master’s graduate] in Computer Science and Digital Image Processing from the Institute of photonics and communications at the National Kaohsiung University of Applied Sciences (Class of 2015).

title: Nguyen Huy Thanh
